alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lafayette; Marshall; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 20 at 9:08AM CDT until March 21 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 possible. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, Until 9 AM CDT Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
